twoSetSkill.name: Overclock 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: After a charged attack using cannon or missile launchers, the next charged attack made after an interval of greater than 1 but less than 4s gains 15% Total DMG Multiplier. This DMG bonus stacks up to 3 times. Adding a stack resets the duration.

threeSetSkill.name: Anti-Entropy 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Bronya equip bonus: Gain 60% Crit DMG.
